# gasco-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                        | Type                | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`           | `label`            | If `true`, the tooltip will be visible.                                            | `string`            | `undefined` |
| `position`        | `position`         | If `true`, the tooltip will be position.                                           | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `stopPropagation` | `stop-propagation` | If `true`, the tooltip will stop propagation on tap.                               | `boolean`           | `true`      |
| `tappable`        | `tappable`         | If `true`, the tooltip will can be clicked and will emit the `gascoTooltip` event. | `boolean`           | `true`      |
| `visible`         | `visible`          | If `true`, the tooltip will be visible.                                            | `boolean`           | `true`      |


## Events

| Event          | Description                         | Type                |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `gascoTooltip` | Emitted when the tooltip is tapped. | `CustomEvent<void>` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
